Package magellan.library.utils

Class Regions.ShipMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.utils.Regions.MultidimensionalMetric
      • magellan.library.utils.Regions.ShipMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Regions.Metric
    Enclosing class:
    Regions
    public static class Regions.ShipMetric
extends Regions.MultidimensionalMetric
    A metric for ship paths. Distances are path lengths, but a path that ends in a land region is rounded up to the next multiple of speed.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class magellan.library.utils.Regions.MultidimensionalMetric

    • Method Detail

      • getNewValue

        protected boolean getNewValue​(Region r1,
                              Region r2,
                              Regions.MultiDimensionalInfo current,
                              Regions.MultiDimensionalInfo next,
                              int[] newValues)
        Returns the distance between r1 an r2 plus current's distance, usually as component-wise sum. If, however, r2 is a land region, the result is rounded up to the next multiple of speed. Oceans with coast increase the plus value.
        Specified by:
        getNewValue in class Regions.MultidimensionalMetric
        newValues - An array with four elements that should hold the result like {dist, plus, realDist, pot}.
        Returns:
        false if the distance of next should not be decreased

      • getNeighbours

        public java.util.Map<CoordinateID,​Region> getNeighbours​(CoordinateID id)
        Returns the direct neighbors of a coordinate.
